title: Permanently banned without a chat restriction or any warning whatsoever a new player to this game...
body: I'll have to admit I was pretty toxic in my games but not to the point in which I can get so easily banned in just one try without even a single warning. I clearly thought riot games would send out at least one warning but I guess that did not happen. I have seen many others more toxic than were toxic for a good year only at most having a two week suspension, to be permanently banned in only playing 25 ranked games as a new player is actually really interesting. I wonder how this system of terms of service works I need more clarification as to why I was permabanned......................

replies.body:
You weren't banned for in game behavior.

Your account was locked for other reasons. You will have to contact player support.

Depends on how toxic you were.

If you were racist, nazi, homophobic or sexist, no second chance. Sorry not sorry.
Nope was not that toxic the worst I said was that my team was cancer lul but i guess that gets your permabanned

nah I do not see information in which you can unless its a security or chargeback issue

You can send in a support ticket under general questions.  Also, Riot sometimes sends you an e-mail with your chat logs that gets incorrectly filtered as spam so I'd check your spam/trash folder as well.  Permanent bans without previous warnings are EXTREMELY rare.  Are you absolutely positive the ban was due to toxicity and not something else?

wait, how do you play ranked games as a new player?

Did you buy the account? If so that is not allowed and Riot would ban the purchased account.

As others have said -- we're going to need to see that chat logs to determine if this was justified. Certain behavior (typically hate speech or threats of violence) can result in an immediate permanent ban.

If you didn't get sent your chat logs or a reason for your ban, you can open a ticket with Riot Support. They're pretty good at getting you the reason behind the ban. If you don't think the logs deserved such an escalation you can post them here for community review -- Riot HAS overturned one or two bans in the past that were found to have been too strict or applied in error.
